subject: Football
Pro Bowl
lead_paragraph: Adrian Peterson ran for 129 yards and 2 touchdowns, and Terrell Owens made up for early sloppiness with two touchdown receptions in the National Football Conference’s 42-30 comeback victory against the American Football Conference on Sunday in the Pro Bowl at Honolulu.
